Description: Fragment of papyrus bearing 16 lines of a Coptic account written against the fibres (verso) and 12 lines of an Arabic letter written along the fibres (recto). Top and left margins are complete.
Curator's comments: Previously unregistered; acquisition and provenance unknown. Under study by Lucian Reinfandt and Adrienn Almasy with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380813) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380813)
